mapper.select: SELECT banner_id, title, link_url, sort_order, is_active, start_at, end_at, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM et_banner WHERE deleted_at IS NULL AND is_active = 1 AND (start_at IS NULL OR start_at <= NOW()) AND (end_at IS NULL OR end_at >= NOW()) ORDER BY sort_order ASC, banner_id DESC
